articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Buddhist monks' 15-week walk for peace ends in Washington, D.C. - NPR
articles.description: On Tuesday, nearly 3,500 people packed American University's Bender Arena for the monks' first public stop in the nation's capital after completing a 15-week trek from Texas that captivated the country. The monks said their aim was to promote mindfulness and …
articles.content: WASHINGTON A group of Buddhist monks bearing a message of peace walked into the heart of Washington, D.C., on Tuesday, greeted by large, joyful crowds as they completed their 15-week trek from Texas.… [+5278 chars]
